name: Sizable Moonjump
description:
This is my first 3D game made using Unity. It has 2 levels, which focus on 2 mechanics: moonjumps and resizing your character.

It is created for the school project Building Playful Worlds at the University of Arts Utrecht.

Assets used:

Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-simple-nature-pack-162153

Procedural fire: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/procedural-fire-141496

Snaps Prototype | Sci-Fi / Industrial: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/snaps-prototype-sci-fi-industrial-136759
